title: of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further and Higher
heading: 1. This Scheme may be cited as the Student Grant (Amendment)(No.2)
text_raw:
1. This Scheme may be cited as the Student Grant (Amendment)(No.2) 

Scheme 2023.
text_norm: 1 scheme may cited student grant (amendment)(no.2) scheme 2023

title: of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further and Higher
heading: 2. This Scheme shall come into operation on 5th September 2023.
text_raw: 2. This Scheme shall come into operation on 5th September 2023.

title: of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further and Higher
heading: In this Scheme “Principal Scheme” means the Student Grant Scheme
text_raw:
3. 

In this Scheme “Principal Scheme” means the Student Grant Scheme 

2023 (S.I. No. 94 of 2023)
text_norm: 3 scheme principal scheme mean student grant scheme 2023 (s.i no 94 2023)

title: of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011), and the Further and Higher
heading: 4. Article 15(7)(d)(v) of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting
text_raw:
4. Article 15(7)(d)(v) of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting 

the following: 

“(v) be required to complete an equivalent period of study on an 
approved post leaving certificate course where more than one 
year was completed on any postgraduate course before being 
eligible to be considered for a grant, or” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Scheme. 

[440] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform, 

5 September, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 September, 2023. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science.
